response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its immense worth to you, I propose a special introductory offer. For a limited time only, you have the opportunity to acquire this exceptional product at an exclusive price of $750,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its market value of $800,000, allowing you to maximize your investment while securing a competitive edge in your industry. I look forward to discussing the details further and exploring how we can facilitate this transaction smoothly. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 750000}
